nodes.text: The Kas tank was a repulsorcraft tank model employed by the Wookiees.

It had a crew of two, a pilot in the front cockpit and a gunner in the rear cockpit. It was armed with a heavy laser cannon mounted outside the cockpit, and was effective against enemy armor. The Kas tank also had room for transporting more troopers.
In 1 ABY, when Chief Attichitcuk assisted Leia Organa and Echuu Shen-Jon in retrieving the Vor'Na'Tu during the Krantian Civil War, his contingent of Wookiee warriors included Kas tanks.
